title: What is the best submachine gun currently? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know if they are the best ones, because I'm not used to using submachine guns, but they are the most used ones, by police corporations, shooting centers, shooting practitioners, enthusiasts and video games. I would agree with them. FN P90  Heckler & Koch MP7  UzI / Mini Uzi  Heckler & Koch MP5  Škorpion VZ. 61  Personally I like the Taurus SMT 40
To be honest, submachine guns are becoming obsolete. Their roles are being superseded by carbines and PDWs. As for which is the best, that depends entirely on the situation.
